gw.api.metric

Interface MetricLimitMethods

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    MetricLimit
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClaimMetricLimit, DecimalClaimMetricLimit, DecimalExposureMetricLimit, ExposureMetricLimit, IntegerClaimMetricLimit, IntegerExposureMetricLimit, MoneyClaimMetricLimit, MoneyExposureMetricLimit, PercentClaimMetricLimit, PercentExposureMetricLimit, ServiceRequestMetricLimitValues

    public interface MetricLimitMethods
    Interface implemented by all claim and exposure metric limits. This interface will be implemented by a Gosu delegate of the appropriate class for the particular claim or exposure metric limit subtype.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IEntityType getBaseType()
      The base type of this metric - either ClaimMetricLimit or ExposureMetricLimit
      java.lang.Comparable getRedValue()
      The value at which the metric should go red
      java.lang.Comparable getTargetValue()
      The target value for the metric
      MetricUnit getUnit()
      The unit used to measure this metric
      java.lang.Comparable getYellowValue()
      The value at which the metric should go yellow
      boolean isDefaultLimit()
      Is this the default limit for a particular metric type, the limit that will be used if there is no exact match on tier or currency

    • Method Detail

      • getTargetValue

        java.lang.Comparable getTargetValue()
        The target value for the metric
        Returns:
        target value, or null

      • getYellowValue

        java.lang.Comparable getYellowValue()
        The value at which the metric should go yellow
        Returns:
        yellow value, or null

      • getRedValue

        java.lang.Comparable getRedValue()
        The value at which the metric should go red
        Returns:
        red value, or null

      • isDefaultLimit

        boolean isDefaultLimit()
        Is this the default limit for a particular metric type, the limit that will be used if there is no exact match on tier or currency
        Returns:
        true if is default, false otherwise

      • getUnit

        MetricUnit getUnit()
        The unit used to measure this metric
        Returns:
        the unit, never null

      • getBaseType

        IEntityType getBaseType()
        The base type of this metric - either ClaimMetricLimit or ExposureMetricLimit
        Returns:
        base type of metric, never null
